Description
Feel like C. Viper from Street Fighter IV with these fantastic bombastic battle boots! These boots were made for kicking butt!\n\nStreet Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesen fantastisch-bombastischen Kampfstiefeln wie C. Viper aus Street Fighter IV! Diese Stiefel wurden dazu gemacht, um in Hintern zu treten. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

STREET FIGHTER IV 바이퍼가 되는 쇼트 부츠. 스타일리시한 부츠로 당신도 오늘부터 미즈 퍼팩트! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
